participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

path_alc_youth1.Description: Have you ever been curious about using a tobacco product such as cigarettes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or cigars? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth2.Description: Have you ever been curious about drinking alcohol? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth3.Description: Have you ever been curious about trying marijuana? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth4.Description: Do you think you will try a tobacco product soon? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth5.Description: Do you think you will try alcohol soon? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth6.Description: Do you think you will try marijuana soon? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth7.Description: If one of your best friends were to offer you a tobacco product, would you try it? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth8.Description: If one of your best friends were to offer you alcohol, would you try it? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth9.Description: If one of your best friends were to offer you marijuana, would you try it? | 1 = Definitely yes; 2 = Probably yes; 3 = Probably not; 4 = Definitely not; 5 = Don't know; 6 = Refused to answer

path_alc_youth1_l.Description: Have you ever been curious about using a tobacco product such as cigarettes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or cigars? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't Know; 6 = Refused /( tlfb_tob_l   == '1' ||   tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1') && ( tlfb_tob_puff_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_chew_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_cigar_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_hookah_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_pipes_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_nicotine_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_tob_puff_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_chew_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_cigar_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_hookah_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_pipes_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_nicotine_use_c_l  =='0')

path_alc_youth1a_l.Description: Have you ever been curious about using a cigarette? | 1=Very curious ; 2=Somewhat curious ; 3=A little curious ; 4=Not at all curious ; 5=Don't Know ; 6=Refused  ([tlfb_tob_puff_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_l] !='1' and [tlfb_tob_puff_c_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_c_l] !='1') and ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' or [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

path_alc_youth1b_l.Description: Have you ever been curious about using an electronic nicotine or vaping product | 1=Very curious ; 2=Somewhat curious ; 3=A little curious ; 4=Not at all curious ; 5=Don't Know ; 6=Refused  ([tlfb_tob_puff_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_l] !='1' and [tlfb_tob_puff_c_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_c_l] !='1') and ([event-name] = '3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' or [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

path_alc_youth2_l.Description: Have you ever been curious about drinking alcohol? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't Know; 6 = Refused /( tlfb_alc_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1') && ( tlfb_alc_sip_l  == '0' &&  tlfb_alc_sip_c_l  == '0')

path_alc_youth3_l.Description: Have you ever been curious about trying marijuana? | 1 = Very curious; 2 = Somewhat curious; 3 = A little curious; 4 = Not at all curious; 5 = Don't Know; 6 = Refused /( tlfb_mj_l  == '1' ||  tlfb_mj_c_l   == '1') &&  tlfb_mj_puff_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_mj_conc_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_mj_drink_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_tincture_use_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_mj_puff_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_mj_conc_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_mj_drink_use_c_l  =='0' &&  tlfb_tincture_use_c_l  =='0'

path_alc_youth4b_l.Description: Do you think you will try an electronic nicotine or vaping product | 1=Definitely yes ; 2=Probably yes ; 3=Probably not ; 4=Definitely not ; 5=Don't know ; 6=Refused  ([tlfb_tob_puff_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_l] !='1' and [tlfb_tob_puff_c_l] !='1' and [tlfb_chew_use_c_l] !='1')  and  ([event-name] ='3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' or [event-name] ='4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')

sua_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'

path_nic_dep_q01.Description: How soon after you wake up do you want to use tobacco? | 1 = Within 5 minutes; 2 = From 6 to 30 minutes; 3 = From more than 30 minutes to 1 hour; 4 = After more than 1 hour but less than 24 hours; 5 = I rarely want to use tobacco

Levels.3: From more than 30 minutes to 1 hour
Levels.4: After more than 1 hour but less than 24 hours
Levels.5: I rarely want to use tobacco

path_nic_dep_q02.Description: Do you ever have strong craving to use tobacco? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

path_nic_dep_q03.Description: Have you ever felt like you really needed to use tobacco? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

path_nic_dep_q04.Description: Please rate your level of agreement for each statement using the following scale: 1=not true. of me at all to 5=extremely true. I find myself reaching for a tobacco product without thinking about it. | 1 = Not true of me at all1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4; 5 = Extremely true of me5

Levels.1: Not true of me at all1
